projects.title: Stack Overflow clone
desc: Developed a Stack Overflow clone enabling users to ask questions, provide answers, and interact through likes, votes, and friendships, enhancing user engagement with a robust question-answering platform.
Implemented secure user authentication and authorization using JWT and bcrypt, providing protected routes and secure password management.
Engineered backend with Node.js and Express.js, supporting RESTful APIs for question, answer, and post management, and integrated MongoDB for efficient data storage.
Created a responsive user interface with React and managed application state using Redux, facilitating seamless user interactions and real-time updates.
Developed features for question-and-answer management, including posting, voting, and updating interactions, with real-time updates and responsive design.
Integrated Cloudinary for image storage, handling user-uploaded images and storing links in the database for efficient media management.
projects.tech_used: React, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Cloudinary, Visual Studio Code, Postman

projects.title: Travel Agency
desc: Developed a user-friendly website for a travel agency, allowing users to explore travel packages, learn about the agency, and book trips.
Designed a visually appealing UI using HTML and CSS, ensuring intuitive navigation and incorporating Swiper.js for dynamic sliders showcasing travel destinations.
Implemented JavaScript for interactivity and PHP for server-side scripting, handling form submissions, and integrating with a MySQL database.
Managed booking information by performing Create and Read operations, inserting booking data into the database, and displaying booking data in a tabular format.
Developed a comprehensive navigation system and client reviews section, enhancing usability, user feedback display, and agency credibility.
projects.tech_used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Swiper.js, Visual Studio Code, XAMPP

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
desc: Developed a comprehensive admin dashboard to manage products, users, transactions, and sales data, enhancing business operations through a centralized interface.
Implemented a dynamic and responsive user interface (UI) using React and @mui/material, integrating advanced data grid functionalities with @mui/x-data-grid for efficient data handling.

Created real-time data visualizations with @nivo/pie and @nivo/line, presenting key metrics such as sales trends, user demographics, and performance insights, and integrated geographical data mapping to visualize user distributions based on country codes.
Engineered the backend with Node.js and Express.js, developing RESTful APIs and utilizing MongoDB for scalable data storage and efficient data retrieval.
Enhanced data management by implementing server-side pagination, sorting, and searching, handling extensive datasets of transactions and user activities.
Ensured security by employing helmet for securing HTTP headers.
projects.tech_used: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MUI, Nivo, Visual Studio Code, Postman

projects.title: BBC-Bakery
projects.desc: Redesigned Bhopal Bakehouse & Cafe website user interface (UI)
projects.tech_used: Visual Studio, HTML5, CSS3, JS, React
